Scheme
======

Release |version|. (:ref:`Changelog`)

*Scheme* is a declarative, general-purpose data schema framework for Python (2.6+, 3.3+). It provides a simple approach to defining data schemas, which then enable serialization/unserialization, validation, interpolation, and other means of interaction with data.
